entity.name: collectingevent
entity.query: SELECT ce.method as ce_method, ce.startDate as ce_startDate, ce.EndDate as ce_endDate, ce.CollectingEventID as primary_id, ce.DisciplineID as DisciplineID, lc.LocalityName as ce_lc_name, lc.Latitude1 as ce_lc_latitude, lc.Longitude1 as ce_lc_longitude, geo.FullName as ce_lc_geo_fullName, 'collectingevent' as t, CONCAT('ce_', CollectingEventID) as id FROM collectingevent as ce LEFT OUTER JOIN locality as lc ON ce.LocalityID=lc.LocalityID LEFT OUTER JOIN geography as geo ON lc.GeographyID=geo.GeographyID
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT ce.method as ce_method, ce.startDate as ce_startDate, ce.EndDate as ce_endDate, ce.CollectingEventID as primary_id, ce.DisciplineID as DisciplineID, ce.Text1 as ce_givenName, lc.LocalityName as ce_lc_name, lc.Latitude1 as ce_lc_latitude, lc.Longitude1 as ce_lc_longitude, geo.FullName as ce_lc_geo_fullName, 'collectingevent' as t, CONCAT('ce_', CollectingEventID) as id FROM collectingevent as ce LEFT OUTER JOIN locality as lc ON ce.LocalityID=lc.LocalityID LEFT OUTER JOIN geography as geo ON lc.GeographyID=geo.GeographyID WHERE CollectingEventID='${dih.delta.CollectingEventID}'
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT CollectingEventID FROM collectingevent WHERE TimestampCreated > '${dih.last_index_time}'
